name: Choc Ripple Fruit Mince Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Gradually add sugar syrup, beating constantly until thick and glossy. Remove tart from tin. Dollop meringue over middle of cheesecake and blowtorch until golden. Serve topped with cherries.
